extension.description:
Welcome to The Talent Lottery add-on! The only one of its kind where any aspiring [COLOR = yellow](fill in the blank)[/COLOR] can advertise their talent here for free, and possibly win their very own add-on! More importantly, this add-on will give the artist the opportunity to win the greatest prize of all, being discovered by professionals in the field they are pursuing! Talent Agents take notice!
The initial launch of Talent Lottery v1.0.0 and v1.0.1 has the following randomly chosen artists... an aspiring singer/songwriter, a filmmaker, makeup artist, voice actor, animator and dancers. All future artists will be chosen by you the viewer!
Nominate your friend, relative, co-worker or even a stranger that you think deserves to be seen by a NEW audience!
Send your nomination to: * [COLOR = blue]the.knife.repo@yandex.com[/COLOR], * subject “NOMINATE” in CAPS, * copy/paste the Youtube channel, playlist or Youtube user ID.
[COLOR = red]YouTubers please advertise this add-on. It can only be a success with your help. If the response is great then updates will occur on the 1st of each month. If not, updates will be released quarterly on the following dates...[/COLOR]
- January 1st - April 1st - July 1st - Oct 1st

You will need to visit[COLOR = blue] http://thekniferepo.wixsite.com/kodi [/COLOR]to manually install the updated Talent Lottery add-on. Please confirm that the version number has been updated on the website before installation.[/COLOR]
